repo_description: A demo GraphQL application server with presentation slides

schemas.name: queries.gql
schemas.content:
type Query {

    # List of available movies
    movies: [Movie!]

    # Get movie by Id
    movie(id: ID!): Movie

    # List of available casts
    casts: [Cast!]

    # Get cast by Id
    cast(id: ID!): Cast

}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/emadalam/graphql-demo/blob/85d07eb2fb831ce746a4710357952a886b871b9e/graphql-server/src/types/queries.gql:
type Query {

    # List of available movies
    movies: [Movie!]

    # Get movie by Id
    movie(id: ID!): Movie

    # List of available casts
    casts: [Cast!]

    # Get cast by Id
    cast(id: ID!): Cast

}

# https://github.com/emadalam/graphql-demo/blob/85d07eb2fb831ce746a4710357952a886b871b9e/graphql-server/src/types/movie.gql:
# Defines the movie type
type Movie {

    # Id of the movie
    id: ID!

    # Name of the movie
    name: String!

    # Casts associated with the movie
    cast: [Cast!]

    # Year of release
    year: Int

}

# https://github.com/emadalam/graphql-demo/blob/85d07eb2fb831ce746a4710357952a886b871b9e/graphql-server/src/types/cast.gql:
# Defines the cast
type Cast {

    # Id of the cast
    id: ID!

    # Name of the cast
    name: String!

    # Movies related to the cast
    movies: [Movie!]

}

schemas.name: cast.gql
schemas.content:
# Defines the cast
type Cast {

    # Id of the cast
    id: ID!

    # Name of the cast
    name: String!

    # Movies related to the cast
    movies: [Movie!]

}

schemas.name: movie.gql
schemas.content:
# Defines the movie type
type Movie {

    # Id of the movie
    id: ID!

    # Name of the movie
    name: String!

    # Casts associated with the movie
    cast: [Cast!]

    # Year of release
    year: Int

}
